channel.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
channel.description:
everytimne i try to open up my Run.bat for my server, this pops up, please help [img]http://i859.photobucket.com/albums/ab158/Shadow742007/problems001.png[/img]
heres my code "@echo off title (Server Name) @echo Your Server Is Now Up..... java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause"

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

exactly, arham4 showed me how to set variables, problems fixed…
me and him tried setting up where my java.exe is multiple times with different run.bat’s didnt wokr cause: I DIDNT HAVE MY VARIABLOE SET!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:9, topic:428264”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=530954.msg3878315#msg3878315 date=1325818380]

His environmental variables aren’t set, no matter what you do java isn’t going to be a recognized command… what don’t you understand people.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,193370.0.html#post_jdkpart2

They don’t have to be set, if you tell it exactly where the file “java.exe” is.
[/quote]
It makes life easier, and if you’re ever going to pursue coding outside of RSPS.[/quote]
Understood.

Read full topic

item.source: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

TRY

@echo off title (Server Name) @echo Your Server Is Now Up..... "C:\Program Files\Java\PUT YOUR VERSION OF JAVA HERE\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

OR Win 7

@echo off title (Server Name) @echo Your Server Is Now Up..... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\PUT YOUR VERSION OF JAVA HERE\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

[quote=“Lotek™, post:4, topic:428264”]Click Start --> Right Click Computer --> Properties --> System Protection --> Go to Advanced --> Enviroment Variables --> Double Click ‘Path’ --> Then insert something along the lines of this:

Replace with your Version of JDK or your “program files” whether you have (x86) or not.[/quote]

this was not the problem at all, environmentals werent set.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]

item.title: Please help, my Run.bat is having problems with java [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Lotek1 Lotek™
item.description:
@Lotek1 wrote:

Click Start --> Right Click Computer --> Properties --> System Protection --> Go to Advanced --> Enviroment Variables --> Double Click ‘Path’ --> Then insert something along the lines of this:

Replace with your Version of JDK or your “program files” whether you have (x86) or not.

Read full topic

title (Server Name)
@echo Your Server Is Now Up…
